Amplify your anonymity.

Your life, your privacy. Text and call on your own terms, using secondary phone numbers from Buzznum.

Phone numbers for everything

Not every first date is going to be “the one.” If you’re online dating or going in blind, give out your Buzznum number so you can keep yourself safe and protect your privacy.

Selling your couch? Subleasing your apartment? Use a Buzznum number in the ad, let all the weirdos call and text, then cancel the number once the transaction’s complete.

Want to call family members in another country? Save money by getting a Buzznum number in their area code, and it’s like making a local call.

Buzznum is perfect for cheap calling and texting when you’re travelling. Get a local Buzznum number for your destination, and pair it with an eSIM so you always have data.

Stores always want your phone number for receipts, returns, and promotions. Give them your Buzznum number instead, and protect your real number from a spammy list.

A private Buzznum number is flexible to your lifestyle and gives you the freedom to connect how you want.

anonymous calling

Make and receive calls with an anonymous phone number. Nothing is connected to your regular phone number, or shows up on a phone bill.

securetexting

Send and receive texts, GIFs, photos, videos, and audio messages on your own secure phone number. Keep every conversation private.

Manage multiple private numbers

Separate each area of your life with multiple phone numbers from Buzznum. Keep each number as long as you’d like, or delete them and get new ones.

auto-reply messages

Automatically respond to any text message sent to your Buzznum number. You can set rules and responses for every situation.

multiple devices

Log into your Buzznum account on any mobile device (including tablets) to call and text. It’s a great way to turn an old phone into a working phone again!

separate contacts

Load existing contacts from your device into Buzznum, or create private contacts that are only accessible within your Buzznum account.

Custom voicemail greetings

Every Buzznum plan includes free voicemail, so you can record custom voicemail greetings for each Buzznum number.

Call forwarding

It’s easy to forward your Buzznum number to another phone number, so you can answer Buzznum calls without needing Wi-Fi or data.

Call routing

If you don’t have Wi-Fi or data, you can route outgoing Buzznum calls to your regular mobile number while keeping your number concealed.

Explore your area of anonymity.

Get a Buzznum phone number in your own area code, or choose from 300+ other area codes.
